subject: Basketball
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: The injury-riddled Bulls failed to get much of anything going on offense as the Heat, led by LeBron James, cruised to a 3-1 series lead to put Chicago on the brink of elimination.
snippet: The injury-riddled Bulls failed to get much of anything going on offense as the Heat, led by LeBron James, cruised to a 3-1 series lead to put Chicago on the brink of elimination.
